Name: ANIME TETRIS
About the game: The villain gathered the most beautiful girls from all over the world and imprisoned them in an energy tower . Your task is to properly connect the energy to free the girls . This is a strategic game that develops logic and attentiveness, as well as a good time killer . Rules of the game: You will need to build bridges between energy sources and gates that hide the girls avoiding places with bombs that destroy previously built bridges In the game: Cute art Gallery with pictures Good music Dynamic atmosphere Progress Leaders Future: new towers with new girls new locations Collectible cards.
